## Supplier Information Rider (SIR) - Maxxmar Dual Opera Horizontal Roller Shades or Equivalent

### RFx Details
* **RFx Title** : Request for Proposal (RFP) for Maxxmar Dual Opera Horizontal Roller Shades or Equivalent
* **RFx Reference Number**: cb-5162-5088214
* **RFx Solicitation Number**: 202304051/A
* **RFx Publication Date**: May 2, 2023

### Procurement Background
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Canadian Police College is seeking replacement window coverings for one of their facilities. The successful supplier will provide Maxxmar Dual Opera Horizontal Roller Shades or an equivalent product.

### Tender Details
The tender closing date is May 18, 2023, at 02:00:00. The expected contract start date is May 22, 2023, and the expected contract end date is June 16, 2023.

### Security Requirements
The supplier's resource(s) must be security cleared at the level of RCMP Facility Access Level 2 – FA2 with escort, as verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the RCMP.

### Evaluation Criteria
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. The evaluation will be based on the mandatory technical evaluation criteria detailed in the Attachment 1 to Part 4 of the Request for Proposal document.

### Additional Requirements
* On-site pre-delivery measurements for all installation locations are required.
* All delivered products must be received on or before June 16, 2023.

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: David Repsys
* **Contact Email**: [David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (343) 575-5298
* **Contact Fax**: None
* **Contact Address**: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2, Canada

### Documents
Tender documents can be accessed via the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

### Notes
